Building B of Yahiko Village, Nishikanba.propertyCaption:
🏯 Historic Heike Mansion: Where Japanese Heritage Meets Modern Living 🌿

Step into a living piece of history with this extraordinary 10LDK mansion that embodies the timeless beauty of traditional Heike architecture. Nestled in the serene natural beauty of Yahiko Village, this property offers an unparalleled opportunity to own a piece of Japan's rich cultural heritage.

🏡 Incredible Space & Character:
• Stunning main Heike building with expansive 10LDK layout and magnificent 22-tatami mat living area
• Additional 2-story building with 3DK layout and generous 12-tatami mat kitchen-diner
• Recently renovated in 2023 with new kitchen, bath, toilet, and roof repairs

🌳 Expansive Grounds:
• Sprawling 1,683.48㎡ property surrounded by Yahiko's natural beauty
• Ample parking for 5 vehicles
• Private garden space perfect for enjoying the changing seasons

🛠️ Thoughtful Renovations:
• Perfectly balances historic character with modern conveniences
• City gas, public water supply, and updated systems throughout
• Immediate move-in ready condition

This once-in-a-lifetime property offers the rare opportunity to live surrounded by history while enjoying all modern comforts. Experience the magic of traditional Japanese architecture in harmony with nature at this exceptional Yahiko Village estate.
